comments:
The test for "stop in main" is failing sometimes. The test suite re-tries the test 10 times before giving up:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests 4 0 2007-02-26 09:43:32.562
!MESSAGE Test failed attempt 10. Re-testing: testStopInMain
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.TestAgainException
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.AbstractDebugTest.launchAndWait(AbstractDebugTest.java:361)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.AbstractDebugTest.launchAndWait(AbstractDebugTest.java:316)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.AbstractDebugTest.launchAndSuspend(AbstractDebugTest.java:393)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.breakpoints.MethodBreakpointTests.testStopInMain(MethodBreakpointTests.java:93)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:585)
	at junit.framework.TestCase.runTest(TestCase.java:164)
	at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:130)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.AbstractDebugTest.runBare(AbstractDebugTest.java:1551)
	at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
	at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
	at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
	at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:120)
	at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:230)
	at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:225)
	at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:230)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.tests.DebugSuite$1.run(DebugSuite.java:54)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

Yes, I believe there is timing issue here.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 178902 ***
